step1.title: Start a Conversation
step1.description: Tell me what you're craving or what ingredients you have. Try asking: "Quick dinner for 2" or "What can I make with chicken?"

step2.title: Customize Your Recipes
step2.description: Filter recipes by cuisine, cooking time, skill level, dietary preferences, and more. Make every recipe perfect for you!

step3.title: Weekly Meal Planning
step3.description: Generate complete meal plans for your week in seconds. Click here to start planning!

step4.title: Smart Grocery Lists
step4.description: Automatically generate organized grocery lists from your meal plans. Never forget an ingredient!

step5.title: Conversation History
step5.description: All your conversations are automatically saved here. Rename, delete, or continue any chat anytime.

step1.title: Start Chatting
step1.description: Ask me anything about cooking! Try: "Easy pasta recipes" or "Healthy dinner ideas"

step2.title: Set Your Preferences
step2.description: Tap the settings icon to customize recipes by cuisine, time, and dietary needs.

step3.title: Explore Features
step3.description: Open the menu to access meal planning, grocery lists, and saved recipes.

problem.title: Sound Familiar?
problem.subtitle: Cooking should be enjoyable, not stressful. Yet these challenges keep appearing:

endless.title: Endless Meal Planning
endless.description: Spending hours every week planning meals and searching for recipes

foodWaste.title: Food Waste
foodWaste.description: Throwing away unused groceries because of poor planning

recipeFatigue.title: Recipe Fatigue
recipeFatigue.description: Eating the same meals on repeat because you're out of ideas

solution.title: Meet Your AI Sous Chef
solution.subtitle: Transform your cooking routine in three simple steps

step1.title: Chat with AI
step1.description: Tell Mon Ami Chef what you want to cook. Natural conversation, instant understanding.

step2.title: Get Your Plan

step3.title: Shop & Cook
step3.description: Auto-generated grocery lists organized by category. Everything you need, nothing you don't.

solution.demoUser: I need a healthy vegetarian dinner for 4 people with ingredients I already have
